article.headline: Butler 86, Elon University 40
article.story: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) -- Butler's Brandon Crone scored nine of his game-high 18 points during a 21-0 first-half run the propelled the Bulldogs to a 86-40 win over Elon on Monday night. That run over more than eight minutes gave Butler (6-4) a 29-3 lead as the Phoenix shot just 14 percent for the first half and trailed 36-12 at half time. Crone was 7-of-9 shooting, leading four Butler players in double figures. Bruce Horan scored 15 on 5-of-9 3-point shooting, along with 11 points from Brandon Polk and 10 by A.J. Graves. Scottie Rice led Elon (2-8) with 13 points as the Phoenix were never closer than 25 points in the second half.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
